meta.summary:
b'The dragon hungers: http://bit.ly/MeetHanzo 

Hanzo Shimada abandoned the criminal empire to which he was heir, forsaking familial duty to seek redemption for killing his brother. Hanzo now travels the world, perfecting his skills as a warrior, attempting to restore his honor and put the ghosts of his past to rest.

An expert marksman, Hanzo can reveal nearby enemies with sonar arrows or fire scatter arrows to strike multiple targets. He can also scale walls with his bare hands and summon a devastating spirit dragon to consume his enemies.

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch'

item.title: Overwatch: How to Be a Pro Hanzo - Advanced Guide

meta.summary:
b'Hanzo 's ranged burst damage is something to be feared, especially with a buff on the horizon. In this video FREEDO breaks down clips from some of the best pro Hanzos in Overwatch esports, laying out the maps and team composition strategies employed by pros. As Hanzo says, it's just simple geometry, putting yourself in position to scout out the enemy's position, secure game winning pick offs and finish off tough checkpoints with the massive dragon strike graviton surge WOMBO COMBO, before long your play too will have people asking "Is that a Pro Hanzo?"

item.title: The Ultimate Hanzo Guide - EVERYTHING you need to know!

meta.summary:
b'Today we take a look at Hanzo, everything from abilities, strategies, and even hero matchups.

MODIFIED NUMBERS: 
Sonic arrow deals the same damage as a normal arrow
Scatter arrows do require charging. at max charge, each scatter shot will deal 75 damage.
The shots scatter no matter what!
